title: Body Image Healing
description: Developing a healthier relationship with your body beyond appearance

modules.title: Understanding Body Image
modules.description: What body image is and how it develops

modules.title: Where Body Image Comes From
modules.description: The cultural, familial, and personal origins of body beliefs

modules.title: The Body Image-Behavior Connection
modules.description: How body image affects eating, movement, and life choices

modules.title: Challenging Body Beliefs
modules.description: Examining and questioning what you believe about bodies

modules.title: Building Body Respect
modules.description: From hatred to neutrality to respect

modules.title: Living Beyond Appearance
modules.description: Finding identity and worth outside of how you look

questions.question: Body image is primarily about:
options: How your body actually looks
How you perceive, think, and feel about your body
Your body weight and measurements
What others think of your appearance

questions.question: Which statement about body image is accurate?
options: Changing your body will fix your body image
Only overweight people struggle with body image
Body image can be negative regardless of actual appearance
Body image is fixed and cannot change

questions.question: Body neutrality focuses on:
options: Achieving the perfect body
Loving every aspect of your appearance
Respecting your body for what it does, not how it looks
Ignoring your body completely

questions.question: Research shows that body dissatisfaction:
options: Motivates lasting healthy behavior change
Leads to more extreme and less sustainable behaviors
Only affects women
Decreases naturally with age

questions.question: A healthy approach to body image includes:
options: Constant body monitoring and checking
Avoiding mirrors entirely
Treating your body with basic respect regardless of feelings
Working harder to achieve the ideal body
